name: Panic (MatthewRoy)
description:
Can you conquer your fears and make it out of the forest? Panic is a top down strategy game where the enemies move when you move, and getting seen causes Panic Mode. In Panic Mode, it's easier to move, but enemies become more aggressive as well.

Made for Advanced Seminar in Game Programming at Champlain College Study Abroad Montreal program. I'm looking for any feedback if you have the time.

This is the finished version of the game, as turned in for class. Feedback is appreciated!

The game on GameJolt: https://gamejolt.com/games/Panic/308831
